title: Outbound SMS: Interacting with an Outbound SMS Campaign
body:
Outbound SMS: Interacting with an Outbound SMS Campaign¶


  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Campaigns

  3. Click Outbound SMS

  4. Click on an outbound SMS campaign to view details, an audit trail, and comments

  5. Click Design Workflow (available when in draft mode) or View Workflow (available when sent) to edit or view the workflow, respectively

  6. Click and Edit Campaign to edit the campaign (available when in draft mode)

  7. Click and Send/Schedule Campaign (available when in draft mode)

    • Curate the list of recipients of the outbound SMS campaign under To (options detailed here )

    • You can opt to Schedule Delivery instead of the default option to Send Immediately by selecting a date and entering a time

    • Click Send

  8. Click and Resend Campaign (available when sent) * Curate the list of recipients of the outbound SMS campaign under To (options detailed here ) * You can opt to Schedule Delivery instead of the default option to Send Immediately by selecting a date and entering a time * Click Resend

  9. Click , Delete Campaign, and Yes to delete the campaign along with all associated workflows and performance data

  10. Click Design Workflow to design your outbound SMS campaign

  11. Click Emails to click on the emails associated with the SMS campaign

  12. Click Performance to view recorded recipient interaction data
